SLM Solutions

企业介绍：

总部位于德国吕贝克的SLM Solutions Group AG是金属增材制造行业的领先技术供应商(也常被成为“金属3D打印”)，自2016年3月21日起，公司股票被列入TecDAX指数并在法兰克福证券交易所挂牌交易。SLM Solutions 专注于激光选区熔化(SLM)设备的研发及制造，致力于提供3D金属打印行业最优解决方案。SLM Solutions 目前在德国、美国、新加坡、俄罗斯、中国拥有超过310名员工，而来自不同行业的客户也均选择SLM Solutions的设备生产复杂零部件，从义齿到涡轮叶片，设备的应用领域极其广泛。这些产品均符合一个共同的要求：满足稳定性、表面质量或生物相容性的最高标准。而且设备的适用范围还在扩大，基本上囊括了所有的几何结构。

Lübeck-based SLM Solutions Group AG is a leading provider of metal-based additive manufacturing technology. The company’s shares are traded in the Prime Standard of the Frankfurt Stock Exchange. The stock has been listed in the TecDAX index since March 21, 2016. SLM Solutions focuses on the development, assembly and sale of machines and integrated system solutions in the field of selective laser melting. SLM Solutions currently employs over 310 members of staff in Germany, the USA, Singapore, Russia and China. Customers from highly varied sectors utilise our machines to produce complex build parts for a large number of applications – from dental prostheses through to turbine blades. All of these products have one thing in common: they must meet the highest standards in terms of stability, surface structure or biocompatibility. And the number of utilisation scenarios is on the rise: almost all geometric forms are possible.

 

产品：

内流道高压反应釜（可涂瓷釉）、钴铬合金 牙桥、不锈钢内流道模具、钛合金 体内植入物、叶轮、内流道展示件。

关于我们

“2018世界制造业大会” 由全球中小企业联盟、联合国工业发展组织、中国人民对外友好协会、安徽省人民政府于2018年5月在合肥共同举办。
